q: Javon Johnson -- familiar to Pittsburgh theater audiences most recently for his portrayal of Othello at PICT-- understudies Robert Christopher Riley as Packers linebacker and Penn State alum David Letterman Robinson. What might the Packers' championship mean for the play? Well, I hope it sells more tickets, Mr. Eric Simonson wrote in an e-mail. For the week that ended with the Super Bowl," Vince Lombardi " was at about 64 percent of the approximately 625-seat capacity at Circle in the Square Theatre on Broadway and W.
